title: Online Clinical Psychology Practice Competency Enhancement Course

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational psychological theories and intermediate-level clinical case experience
context.additional_context: Practice-oriented training for professionals in medical/legal/technical fields

learning_goals: Learners can apply major clinical psychology theories (e.g., cognitive-behavioral therapy, psychodynamic approaches) to real-world cases.
Learners can practice therapeutic techniques and conduct self-assessments using online simulation tools.
Learners can analyze complex clinical cases and develop treatment plans through team-based projects.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
